content:
I've this new message returned... I didn't update my IG, just the publisher...
Suggestions ?

 Installing hl7.eu.fhir.xeh#dev to the package cache
  Fetching:
  Installing:  done.
Checking Output HTML                                                             (01:16.0588)
found 591 files                                                                  (01:16.0637)
..........................................
..........................................
Publishing Content Failed: The <script> src 'http://hl7.org/fhir/history-cm.js' is llegal (01:23.0488)
same error also for other IGs I tried to recompile..
grr I just discovered that error too

I'm sure you are aware about it :-)..the error turned into
The <script> src 'http://hl7.org/fhir/assets-hist/js/jquery.js' is llegal
Should be able to build again now

Now it builds but still getting "The link 'history.html' for "History" cannot be resolved" error and "The html source does not contain the publish box; this is recommended for publishing support (see note at http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Implementation_Guide_Publishing_Requirements#HL7_HTML_Standards_considerations). Note that this is mandatory for HL7 specifications, and on the ci-build, but in other cases it's still recommended (this is only reported once, but applies for all pages)" info
both those issues will be resolved when I next release the IG publisher
@Grahame Grieve I'm still getting "The link 'history.html' for "History" cannot be resolved" with v1.1.34
